divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside on my porch to smoke about 23:15 pm, i looked up to the north sky and i saw something flying really low in the sky what i thought was a large flock of birds.. As it got closer, I realized that it was a triangle shape of lights that were kind of dim, as it flew by I could vagely tell that the back of it was kind of transparent. I ran in the house to get my daughter because I knew then that this was a UFO, when we came back out it had moved a great distantance into the sky flying south and she couldn't see it.. OMG people they are real...
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around October 12th 2010
Summary: I saw a group of lights in the north sky tonight, it was a UFO
